highlights: Spearhead the redevelopment of the Survey Engine front end, transitioning from ASP.NET Web Forms to React, eliminating legacy code, enhancing accessibility, and improving overall UI/UX.

Develop a theming solution using CSS custom properties (variables), reducing custom CSS by 84%, leading to faster load times and improved performance. Enhanced user experience with prebuilt themes, dynamic color contrast checks, and a live preview feature.

Lead accessibility initiatives, implementing WCAG 2.1 AA-compliant features, improving platform usability through enhancements such as screen reader support, keyboard navigation, adaptive themes, user preferences, and improved mobile interactions.
Advocate for modern testing practices, promoting the adoption of React Testing Library for user-centric testing.
